document_data.name: Swords Cast Down
document_data.mainbody: '''Swords Cast Down''' was a sacred holy ritual observed by worshipers of [[Lliira]], the Goddess of Joy.
document_data.History: All of Lliira's holy ceremonies begun with the ritual of Swords Cast Down. At least two weapons were cast to the ground while participants chanted. The weapons were covered with fresh flowers that were either picked, or conjured with [[magic]] by a senior member of the clergy if none were available because of the season or location.
